room_title: Escape room "R.I.P. Rest in Pieces" by Escape Room Fayetteville in Fayetteville
room_address: 3639 B. Sycamore Dairy Road Fayetteville, NC 28303
room_description:
In recent months, a mysterious serial killer who identifies himself as, ‘The Grim Reaper’ committed four ghastly murders around Fayetteville. Today more victims have been reported missing.
Always one step ahead, the Grim Reaper has struck again and you are trapped inside his chamber of horrors.
You have 60 minutes to escape before the Grim Reaper returns or you will become his next victims.
